title: Why the World Cup could delay some MLS-based USMNT stars' European dreams
summary: The USMNT has several breakout stars in MLS who, in years past, would've jumped at a January move abroad. In 2026, though, they might have to sit tight.
aiSummary: MLS-based USMNT players may delay European transfers due to the 2026 World Cup.
The World Cup's proximity influences player career decisions.
USMNT players are potentially prioritizing playing in the World Cup on home soil.
